files.patch:
@@ -121,5 +121,5 @@
-  # ifneq ($$(findstring $$($1_NATURE), HOTSPOT NATIVE MIXED), )
-  #   ifeq ($(TOOLCHAIN_TYPE), microsoft)
-  #     $$(error Visual C++ is not yet supported as an indexer for native workspaces!)
-  #   endif
-  # endif
+  ifneq ($$(findstring $$($1_NATURE), HOTSPOT NATIVE MIXED), )
+    ifeq ($$(call isCompiler, microsoft), true)
+      $$(error Visual C++ is not yet supported as an indexer for native workspaces!)
+    endif
+  endif
